import React from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import {useState} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { useContext } from 'react'; const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu] = useState("shop"); const {getTotalCartItems}= useContext() return (

NOVASHOP

  • {setMenu("shop")}}>Shop{menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("womens")}}>Women{menu==="womens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("mens")}}>Men{menu==="mens"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}>Kids{menu==="kids"?
    :<>}
0
) } export default Navbar
